products.title: Corsica, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The corsica range is one filled with class and sophistication, without giving up its traditional floral roots. The gold offers this pretty floral pattern in a golden yellow and parchment grey, resulting in a stunningly understated feel all over. Give the gold a home in your living room or guest bedroom, where the subtle yellow tone will add a hint of cheer without overwhelming the room.
